com.wx.fx.gui.window

Interface StageController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransferController

    public interface StageController
    Interface that describes a stage controller that can be loaded with the StageManager.

    Created on 10/07/2015

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void closing()
      This method is called when this stage is closed
      default void setArguments(java.lang.Object... args)
      This method is called every time this stage is activated.
      default void setContext(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      This method is called once at the stage's initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        default void setContext(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        This method is called once at the stage's initialization.
        Parameters:
        stage - Reference to the stage corresponding to this controller

      • setArguments

        default void setArguments(java.lang.Object... args)
        This method is called every time this stage is activated. It receives the arguments passed along by the caller.
        Parameters:
        args - Optional arguments for this stage

      • closing

        default void closing()
        This method is called when this stage is closed
